trans-unit.source: Animates the value of a <see cref="T:System.String" /> property along a set of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames" /> over a specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />.

A key frame animation's target values are defined by its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A> property, which contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringKeyFrame> objects.
trans-unit.target: Valores de destino de uma animação quadro-chave são definidos por seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A> propriedade, que contém uma coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringKeyFrame> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringKeyFrame> defines a segment of the animation with its own target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringKeyFrame.Value%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringKeyFrame> define um segmento da animação com seu próprio destino <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringKeyFrame.Value%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When the animation runs, it progresses from one key value to the next at the specified key times.
trans-unit.target: Quando a animação é executada, ela avança de um valor de chave para a próxima no local especificado da chave vezes.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> class.
The object to be added as the child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
Adds a child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringKeyFrame" /> to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
This method allows <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringKeyFrame> objects to be direct children of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames> object in markup.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringKeyFrame> objetos sejam filhos direcionam de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames> objeto na marcação.

trans-unit.source: The parameter <paramref name="child" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringKeyFrame" />.
The text added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
Adds a text string as a child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.

A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames> does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise an `InvalididOperationException` unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames> não aceita texto como um filho, para que esse método gerará uma `InvalididOperationException` , a menos que uma classe derivada substituiu esse comportamento que permite que o texto a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise this exception unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> to clone.
Makes this instance a deep copy of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> método e não deve ser chamado diretamente no seu código de exceção ao chamar a implementação base ao substituir esse método.

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma cópia modificável do objeto atual, chame <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> em vez de chamar este método diretamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> to clone.
Makes this instance a modifiable deep copy of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> using current property values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> método e não deve ser chamado diretamente no seu código de exceção ao chamar a implementação base ao substituir esse método.

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma cópia modificável do objeto atual, chame <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> em vez de chamar este método diretamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
<see langword="true" /> to check if this instance can be frozen; <see langword="false" /> to freeze this instance.
Makes this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> object unmodifiable or determines whether it can be made unmodifiable..
If <paramref name="isChecking" /> is true, this method returns <see langword="true" /> if this instance can be made read-only, or <see langword="false" /> if it cannot be made read-only.

If <paramref name="isChecking" /> is false, this method returns <see langword="true" /> if this instance is now read-only, or <see langword="false" /> if it cannot be made read-only, with the side effect of having begun to change the frozen status of this object.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> object to clone.
Makes this instance a clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> object.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Ao copiar as propriedades de dependência, esse método copia associações de dados e referências de recurso (mas eles não podem mais resolver), mas não animações ou seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: Note that if these properties contain resource references or data bindings, <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Observe que, se essas propriedades contêm referências de recurso ou associações de dados, <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> falhará quando tentar congelar o objeto e lançará um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> método e não deve ser chamado diretamente no seu código de exceção ao chamar a implementação base ao substituir esse método.

trans-unit.source: To create a frozen copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma cópia congelada do objeto atual, chame <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> em vez de chamar este método diretamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> to copy and freeze.
Makes this instance a frozen clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A> método e não deve ser chamado diretamente no seu código de exceção ao chamar a implementação base ao substituir esse método.

trans-unit.source: To create a frozen copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma cópia congelada do objeto atual, chame <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A> em vez de chamar este método diretamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.
The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.

An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" /> that generates the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" /> used by the host animation.
Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current instance.

If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> that is not <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o `defaultOriginValue` é o primeiro na cadeia de composição, esse valor será o valor de instantâneo (se estiver disponível) ou o valor da propriedade base; caso contrário, esse valor será o valor retornado pela animação anterior na cadeia com um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> que não é <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.
trans-unit.target: O `defaultDestinationValue` é o valor de base se a animação for a primeira camada de composição de animações em uma propriedade; caso contrário, o valor é o valor de saída da camada de composição anterior de animações para a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> whose natural duration is desired.
Provide a custom natural <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> property is set to <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />.

If the last key frame of this animation is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" />, then this value is used as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration" />; otherwise it will be one second.
Gets or sets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringKeyFrame" /> objects that define the animation.
The collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringKeyFrame" /> objects that define the animation.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringKeyFrame" /> objetos que definem a animação.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringKeyFrameCollection.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringKeyFrameCollection.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: Called when the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> object is modified.

Returns true if the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames" /> property of this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StringAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> should be value-serialized.
<see langword="true" /> if the property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The child object to add.
Adds a child object.
The text to add to the object.
Adds the text content of a node to the object.
Gets or sets an ordered collection P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames associated with this animation sequence.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames" />.
